code: import React from"react";import"./style.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const FIELD_TYPES={INPUT_TEXT:1,TEXTAREA:2};const Field=_ref=>{let{type=FIELD_TYPES.INPUT_TEXT,label,name,placeholder}=_ref;let component;switch(type){case FIELD_TYPES.INPUT_TEXT:component=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:name,placeholder:placeholder,"data-testid":"field-testid"});break;case FIELD_TYPES.TEXTAREA:component=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:name,"data-testid":"field-testid"});break;default:component=/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:name,placeholder:placeholder,"data-testid":"field-testid"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputField",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:label}),component]});};Field.defaultProps={label:"",placeholder:"",type:FIELD_TYPES.INPUT_TEXT,name:"field-name"};export default Field;
